Title: Windows.Forms.Controls Revisited  (SSTA.WinForms)
Description: SearchableListBox control built on the Window,Form.ListBox renders a list box items with multiple search terms highlighted.
HomeWiki:
Sample VB.NET code for extending Windows.Forms.Controls functionality.

The controls include:

SearchableListBox Renders highlighted list items based on search text.

MarkupTextRenderer (future)
